title: Boycott buying anything until Riot fixes bot issue
body: I'm not letting my family spend any more money on skins, etc. until RIot fixes the issue with hax bots in the game.  I'm tired of being only human on my team and if I want to sit aside and let other team push and win riot punishes me with afk warning or 5 long wait times for leaving/afk.  Riot needs to fix this shit.  I end up with same bots all day long but I get the punishment? FFS i'm boycotting spending any money and I urge you to as well.  The only way to get riot to do something is hit them where it hurts.

replies.body: your level 10 there are leveling bots but if you play pvp like a real player then you will find real players imagin that. Riot does what they can but they cant catch everyone
how many people want to follow this guy, I could go on and on saying why this post is wrong but nvm..if anyone has some common sense they'll figure it out.

"hax bots"? Lol, what.

Nobody is going to boycott anything because you are bad and get destroyed by better players. Maybe just accept they are better than you instead of trying to blame it on hacking. 
League is not hackable in a game-exploitation sense, everything is server-side. Even if it was, it would do no good. a computer cannot play league anywhere near as well as a decent real player, there is no possible aimbotting or ways to micro input effectively.

Maybe find a game more suited to your age range.
